cohortName: [PL 4137275001] Vasculitis referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4137275) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4137275002] Vasculitis referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4137275) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4137275003] Vasculitis by Bernatsky, First diagnosis of Polyarteritis nodosa and allied conditions with > 2 diagnosis or 1 claim by a rheumatologist
